name: Stone Kicker
description:
Short Story:

An old man named Miguelulul was invited on the journey to test his skills. He navigated the mountain scene, counting each step to reach the rightest side. With his determination and intelligence, he succeeded in his quest. He became known as the greatest adventurer, inspiring future generations. 

Can you make it?

Controls:

  • Arrow_Key -> Move, Push stone
  • R -> Restart

Rules:

  • Cannot push stack stone
  • Each stage has limit move if move less than 0 then you die
  • Goal of each stage is go to the rightest of the scene then go next stage

Play now
